summary: mtd: physmap: physmap-bt1-rom: Fix unintentional stack access
details:
mtd: physmap: physmap-bt1-rom: Fix unintentional stack access

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.11.20 by commit 4e4ebb827bf09311469ffd9d0c14ed40ed9747aa, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit b3e79e7682e075326df8041b826b03453acacd0a. For more details please see the references link.
